compatibility.notes: The Elastic-2.0 license allows for proprietary use, but care must be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Compliance with all terms and conditions of the license.
Reinstatement of licenses if violations are corrected within 30 days of notice.
license.name: Elastic-2.0
obligations: Must not provide the software as a hosted or managed service.
Must not alter or disable license key functionality.
Must not remove or obscure licensing, copyright, or other notices.
Must ensure that anyone who receives the software also gets a copy of the license terms.
If modified, must include prominent notices stating modifications.
